Bello e divertente sopratutto giocato in gruppo.

Im sure to some masochists this seems like a good investment and a fun, valuable way to spend your free time. But as one of those masochists, i assure you this game is in no way fun, only addicting. Its already problematic that a full price game has half of its characters locked behind a paywall. I understand that Behaviour has a hard time getting these licenses but I dont think it should still cost me 5 euros to play as any of the characters that come from a movie or game franchise. So im ending this review with a statement of one of the most popular dbd youtubers: "If a person buys you this game for Christmas, they probably hate you".
4 sobrevivientes y 1 asesino, tiene que ser un juego que debes tener en tu biblioteca de juegos.
Entretenido para jugar con amigos y pasar un buen rato

ainda precisa de muitas e muitas melhorias, porÃ©m o jogo e sua maioria Ã© bem divertido e as vezes frustrante em funÃ§Ã£o de alguns players mais toxicos.

This game is challenging to say the least, either as a survivor or killer it doesn't matter. Each survivor and killer has unique perks that are associated to them!
As a survivor, your main goal is to complete generators and escape the map whilst simultaniously evading the killer and helping other survivors. However don't think this will be a walk in the park, the killer is faster and depending on whom the killer maybe can give you a fright and a hard chase. This game emphasise's on team work as survivors! Releasing other survivors from hooks and healing them is a major bonus if you want to escape! Lone wolfing as a survivor is a major recipe for failure so help your fellow survivors!

As a killer your main objective is to stop the Survivors from completing their objective's and sacrifice them to the entity. Again don't think this will be a walk in the park as survivors can easily stun you via dropping pallet's, Using a flashlight/torch to blind you, distract you from keeping survivors hooked, etc. A recipe for a good killer is to remain vigilante. A mistake by a survivor can give you a short but helpful indication as to where they are on the map. You also have the ability to kick generators which reduces the generators completion and for a short time makes it harder for the survivors to repair. Watch out for the hatch and make sure to close it (Or maybe escort ;) A survivor to it) As this will make it harder for the last survivor to escape.
Overall I love this game, the general eerie vibe you get from first spawning in to the general heart pounding escape you may have to do running from the killer. Or the satisfaction you get from escaping or getting the last survivor on a hook and sacrificing them is well worth the time and sometimes frustration!
I hope this review was insightful. 
Thanks for reading!

So, I love this game, despite the fact that it has its downsides, but we will be honest, that the disadvantages are everywhere. For example, in the DBD, I don't understand why the textures are so soapy. I think even with my meager knowledge in 3d modeling, I would have amassed the textures better. I understand that the thing here in optimization, not the inability of developers, but I do not understand why optimization is not in the best condition at the moment. I'm not going to say that I know how to make it better. Because I do not know. But still, this game is one of a kind. And I will always recommend it.
